sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sidebar', templateUrl: './sidebar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sidebar.component.css'] }) export class SidebarComponent { activeMenu: string | null = null; // Track which menu is open // Toggle the visibility of submenus based on the clicked menu toggleMenu(menu: string): void { // If the menu clicked is already open, close it if (this.activeMenu === menu) { this.activeMenu = null; } else { this.activeMenu = menu; } } }
